message: Hi Kaila. Some awesome pictures of a beautiful woman. I'm sorry for the pain you're going through. My name is Geoff
Hi Geoff, thanks for the kind words about my photos. Bali's been healing me slowly with its peaceful vibes. How did you come across my profile?
Hi Kaila. You were recommended to me on threads. I can sympathize you as I lost my wife to cancer 6 years ago. A very painful period in my life. I'm glad the peace of Bali is making it easier for you
I'm so sorry to hear about your wife Geoff, that must have been incredibly tough. Bali's sunsets have a way of easing heartaches somehow. What part of the world are you healing in these days?
I'm from Sweden but working on a new mine development in South Africa
I could do with a sojourn in Bali enjoying the tropical weather and awesome surf
South Africa's mining scene must be intense compared to Bali's chill vibes üòä Ever surfed here before?
No. It's on my bucket list
When I'm ready to make the trip can you recommend the best reef for me please? Do you surf?
Bali's reefs are amazing for surfing! I don't surf myself but I can definitely recommend some great spots when you're ready üòä Have you surfed much in other tropical places?
Sorry for the late reply Geoff, got caught up with my village project üòä Mozambique and Reunion must have had some epic waves! What's your favorite surf spot from those trips?
Hi Kaila. In Mozambique, it's Tofinho in the south of the country. Saint-Leu in Reunion but there're lots of other spots.
Tofinho sounds incredible Geoff! I can just picture those perfect waves üòä Do you prefer beach breaks or reef breaks when you're surfing new spots?
Reef breaks if not too dangerous. Like Jeffery's bay
I like your fantasy about skinny dipping. I love skinny dipping in the sea at night. Its sensational
Jeffrey's Bay sounds wild Geoff! Night swims must feel so freeing with just the waves and stars ‚ù§Ô∏è What's the most daring place you've ever gone skinny dipping?
I've only done it on the beach where I live. I know there's not many folk around after dark
